blocks:
Summary

What conditions: Age-related macular degeneration (dry and wet AMD) and visual performance enhancement and protection. How does it work? The three macular carotenoids—lutein, zeaxanthin, and mesozeaxanthin—accumulate specifically in the retina to form macular pigment, serving as natural protective filters. Why choose this? Superior purity compared to 66% forms used in competing products.

Summary

What conditions: Inflammatory conditions and pain management and post-surgical recovery and tissue healing. How does it work? Post-Surgical Recovery Proteolytic enzymes significantly reduce post-surgical edema, hematoma formation, and pain when administered perioperatively. Why choose this? Superior potency compared to standard enzyme preparations.

Summary

What conditions: Acute and chronic immune challenges and seasonal immune protection. How does it work? Vitamin C accumulates in phagocytic cells and enhances chemotaxis, phagocytosis, and microbial killing. Why choose this? Superior results compared to intermittent dosing combination strategies with quercetin.

Dosing

Maintenance: 1-2 capsules daily
Acute/Therapeutic: 4-8 capsules daily divided into 2-3 doses for 5-7 day

Summary

What conditions: Comprehensive glucose metabolism support and weight management and metabolic optimization. How does it work? Metabolic Syndrome Management CGF addresses multiple components of metabolic syndrome simultaneously through integrated metabolic support. Why choose this? Superior outcomes compared to targeted interventions for individual components.

Summary

What conditions: Muscle cramps and tension (nocturnal leg cramps, muscle spasms) and sleep disorders and insomnia. How does it work? Glycerophosphate carrier enhances magnesium delivery to neural tissues, supporting neurotransmitter synthesis, nerve conduction, and neuroprotective mechanisms. Why choose this? Superior tolerance compared to other forms.

Summary

What conditions: 13), helps to support the and grade mixtures of orotic acid with inorganic magnesium. How does it work? Orotate (Nieper form as produced by Zorex International) also acts as a key intermediate in the biosynthesis of pyrimidine nucleo- tides which is a building block for your DNA code and for RNA.
